# Module: tf.spectral

### Module `tf.spectral`



Defined in [`tensorflow/python/ops/spectral_ops.py`](https://www.github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/r1.1/tensorflow/python/ops/spectral_ops.py).

Spectral operators (e.g. FFT, RFFT).


## Functions

[`fft(...)`](../tf/fft): Compute the 1-dimensional discrete Fourier Transform over the inner-most

[`fft2d(...)`](../tf/fft2d): Compute the 2-dimensional discrete Fourier Transform over the inner-most

[`fft3d(...)`](../tf/fft3d): Compute the 3-dimensional discrete Fourier Transform over the inner-most 3

[`ifft(...)`](../tf/ifft): Compute the inverse 1-dimensional discrete Fourier Transform over the inner-most

[`ifft2d(...)`](../tf/ifft2d): Compute the inverse 2-dimensional discrete Fourier Transform over the inner-most

[`ifft3d(...)`](../tf/ifft3d): Compute the inverse 3-dimensional discrete Fourier Transform over the inner-most

[`irfft(...)`](../tf/spectral/irfft): Compute the inverse 1-dimensional discrete Fourier Transform of a real-valued

[`irfft2d(...)`](../tf/spectral/irfft2d): Compute the inverse 2-dimensional discrete Fourier Transform of a real-valued

[`irfft3d(...)`](../tf/spectral/irfft3d): Compute the inverse 3-dimensional discrete Fourier Transform of a real-valued

[`rfft(...)`](../tf/spectral/rfft): Compute the 1-dimensional discrete Fourier Transform of a real-valued signal

[`rfft2d(...)`](../tf/spectral/rfft2d): Compute the 2-dimensional discrete Fourier Transform of a real-valued signal

[`rfft3d(...)`](../tf/spectral/rfft3d): Compute the 3-dimensional discrete Fourier Transform of a real-valued signal
